metadata.synopsis: While walking down the steps to the central hall of the grotto. Shadowheart hypes up the anticipation for what is to come while filling up the dead space.

2.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar.  Commenting on the Shar cloister as she moves through it to confront her superior
